languages.text: "Да, Глейто, здесь определенно что-то не так. И мы скоро узнаем, что именно".
"You're right, Glaito, something is definitely wrong. And we will know what very soon."
languages.original_text: "Да, Глейто, здесь определенно что-то не так. И мы скоро узнаем, что именно".

traits.locale_text: "You're right, Glaito, something is definitely wrong. And we will know what very soon."
"You're right, Glaito, something is definitely wrong. And we will know what very soon."
"You're right, Glaito, something is definitely wrong. And we will know what very soon."
"You're right, Glaito, something is definitely wrong. And we will know what very soon."
"You're right, Glaito, something is definitely wrong. And we will know what very soon."
"You're right, Glaito, something is definitely wrong. And we will know what very soon."

languages.text: “你说得没错，格雷托。确实有什么东西很不对劲，我们很快就会找到答案。”
languages.original_text: "You're right, Glaito, something is definitely wrong. And we will know what very soon."

traits.locale_text: “你说得没错，格雷托。确实有什么东西很不对劲，我们很快就会找到答案。”

languages.text: «Tienes razón, Glaito, aquí falla algo. Y pronto sabremos de qué se trata».
languages.original_text: "You're right, Glaito, something is definitely wrong. And we will know what very soon."

traits.locale_text: «Tienes razón, Glaito, aquí falla algo. Y pronto sabremos de qué se trata».

languages.text: « Tu as raison, Glaito, il y a quelque chose d'anormal. Et nous allons bientôt découvrir de quoi il s'agit. »
languages.original_text: "You're right, Glaito, something is definitely wrong. And we will know what very soon."

traits.locale_text: « Tu as raison, Glaito, il y a quelque chose d'anormal. Et nous allons bientôt découvrir de quoi il s'agit. »

languages.text: 「グライト、その通りだ。何かがおかしい。だが、すぐにそれが何か分かるだろう」
languages.original_text: "You're right, Glaito, something is definitely wrong. And we will know what very soon."

traits.locale_text: 「グライト、その通りだ。何かがおかしい。だが、すぐにそれが何か分かるだろう」

languages.text: "Haklısın Glaito, kesinlikle bir şeyler yanlış. Çok yakında ne olduğunu öğreneceğiz."
languages.original_text: "You're right, Glaito, something is definitely wrong. And we will know what very soon."

traits.locale_text: "Haklısın Glaito, kesinlikle bir şeyler yanlış. Ve çok yakında ne olduğunu öğreneceğiz."

languages.text: "Du hast recht, Glaito, irgendetwas stimmt definitiv nicht. Und wir werden sehr bald wissen, was."
languages.original_text: "You're right, Glaito, something is definitely wrong. And we will know what very soon."

traits.locale_text: "Du hast recht, Glaito, irgendetwas stimmt definitiv nicht. Und wir werden sehr bald wissen, was."
